modName: The Floating Garden of Skyrim - WIP
summary: Yes this is a house way higher than the Throat of the World! Made by the ancient Dwemer race to house the Dovahkiins.
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod in progress but feel free to visit any changes and grab it once finished.

Yes this is a house way higher than the Throat of the World! Made by the ancient Dwemer to house the Dovahkiins.

A mountable dragon would be nice...

==================
Story
==================
Hundred of years have passed since the mysterious garden vanished from the surface of Skyrim. Many researchers believe that this garden was once the home of Dovahkiins, a powerful mortals that can use the dragon words.

Look for the clues and find this place.

==================
Features
==================
- House in a separate plane with all of your needs
- Beautiful garden

==================
Changelog
==================
- Created base template
author: Frost
